biotools.summary: Web server for inferring, displaying and parsing mRNA and microRNA gene regulatory networks. It combines sequence information with gene expression data analysis to create a disease specific, genome wide regulatory network. Only supports human and mouse.

bioschemas.name: mirConnX
bioschemas.summary: Web server for inferring, displaying and parsing mRNA and microRNA gene regulatory networks. It combines sequence information with gene expression data analysis to create a disease specific, genome wide regulatory network. Only supports human and mouse.
